component.name: infinitetux
component.summary: Retro 2D platformer inspired by Infinite Mario (native SDL2 edition)

description.p: Infinite Tux is a retro-style 2D platformer inspired by Infinite Mario. This edition is a C++ port of the original Java version, built on SDL2 with full gamepad support.

The game is procedurally generated every time it is replayed, so you always play a different game. You can break blocks, run fast, collect coins and get one-ups. Run through the levels stepping on enemies and spitting colorful spit balls to kill them. Carry de-hatched chick eggs and launch them towards other enemies to kill them too!
Features include configurable keyboard and gamepad controls, multiple MIDI synthesizer backends, fullscreen mode, and user-customizable assets.
Infinite Tux recreates the feel of those fun 1980's platformer games that kept people sitting in front of their CRT television sets for hours on end. Have fun and enjoy this 8-bit retro style game!
